Package com.mapbox.android.gestures

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MoveGestureDetector.OnMoveGestureListener  
    MultiFingerTapGestureDetector.OnMultiFingerTapGestureListener  
    RotateGestureDetector.OnRotateGestureListener
    Listener for rotate gesture callbacks.
    ShoveGestureDetector.OnShoveGestureListener
    Listener for shove callbacks.
    SidewaysShoveGestureDetector.OnSidewaysShoveGestureListener
    Listener for sideways shove gesture callbacks.
    StandardGestureDetector.StandardOnGestureListener
    Listener that merges GestureDetector.OnGestureListener and GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener.
    StandardScaleGestureDetector.StandardOnScaleGestureListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidGesturesManager
    Entry point for all of the detectors.
    BaseGesture<L>
    Base class for all of the gesture detectors.
    Constants  
    MoveDistancesObject
    Class that holds initial, previous and current X and Y on-screen coordinates for active pointers.
    MoveGestureDetector
    Gesture detector handling move gesture.
    MoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnMoveGestureListener  
    MultiFingerDistancesObject
    Object that holds pixel current and previous distances between a pair of fingers.
    MultiFingerGesture<L>
    Base class for all multi finger gesture detectors.
    MultiFingerTapGestureDetector
    Gesture detector handling multi tap gesture.
    PointerDistancePair  
    ProgressiveGesture<L>
    Base class for all progressive gesture detectors.
    RotateGestureDetector
    Gesture detector handling rotation gesture.
    RotateGestureDetector.SimpleOnRotateGestureListener  
    ShoveGestureDetector
    Gesture detector handling shove gesture.
    ShoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnShoveGestureListener  
    SidewaysShoveGestureDetector
    Gesture detector handling sideways shove gesture.
    SidewaysShoveGestureDetector.SimpleOnSidewaysShoveGestureListener  
    StandardGestureDetector
    Detector that wraps GestureDetectorCompat.
    StandardGestureDetector.SimpleStandardOnGestureListener
    Listener that mirrors GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener.
    StandardScaleGestureDetector
    Detector that wraps ScaleGestureDetector.
    StandardScaleGestureDetector.SimpleStandardOnScaleGestureListener  
    Utils  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AndroidGesturesManager.GestureType
